Second Effect: 4 Piece: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.
4 Piece: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.
4 Piece: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.
4 Piece: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

First Effect: 2 Piece: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
Second Effect: 4 Piece: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.
4 Piece: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.
4 Piece: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
4 Piece: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.
4 Piece: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

First Effect: 2 Piece: Physical DMG is increased by 25%.
Second Effect: 4 Piece: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

First Effect: 2 Piece: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20%.
Second Effect: 4 Piece: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
4 Piece: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
4 Piece: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

First Effect: 2 Piece: Gain a 15% Geo DMG Bonus.
Second Effect: 4 Piece: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.
4 Piece: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
4 Piece: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
4 Piece: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.
4 Piece: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.
4 Piece: Increases Superconduct DMG by 100%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG Bonus by 30% for 10s.
4 Piece: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.
4 Piece: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.
4 Piece: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

First Effect: 2 Piece: All Elemental RES increased by 20%.
Second Effect: 4 Piece: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.
4 Piece: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.
4 Piece: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.
4 Piece: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.
4 Piece: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
4 Piece: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
4 Piece: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

4 Piece: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s.
